about.title: About Me
about.text:
Hi, I'm Andrey (UNVI), a Python backend developer passionate about building scalable, efficient, and reliable systems. My experience includes developing Telegram bots with telebot and aiogram, as well as creating Discord integrations using discord.py. I work extensively with backend frameworks like Flask, Quart, and FastAPI, and I'm comfortable designing robust APIs and handling asynchronous workflows.
Beyond Python, I enjoy working with tools and technologies such as Redis, Docker, and databases like MySQL, MariaDB, and SQLite. Iâ€™m driven by the challenge of solving real-world problems and continually refining my craft to deliver clean, maintainable, and effective solutions.

services.title: Services
services.text: I offer services in developing Telegram and Discord bots, as well as creating APIs and backend systems for web applications. My services include design, development, and deployment of your projects on a server.
